alert.note: Alert for Jo Daviess (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 4:49PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Burst of accumulating snow this evening... A fast-moving system will spread across east-central Iowa into northwest Illinois this evening into late overnight tonight. This will bring snow accumulations between 1 to 3 inches, with a brief period of snowfall rates of 1 inch per hour for a 2 to 3 hour period, along and north of a line from Williamsburg to Cedar Rapids to Galena. Sudden reductions in visibility below a mile at times are expected with this snow. Temperatures below freezing will allow snow to accumulate and make travel on untreated roads slippery this evening. Please use extra caution if traveling this evening.
